name: confusingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes it difficult for you to understand something: The two girls' names are confusingly similar. Confusingly, none of the houses in this street had a number.
More examplesFewer examplesThe people I asked for directions gave me confusingly different answers.The plot moves confusingly back and forth between the different stages of the artist's career. Confusingly, there is a different system in the western part of the country.Confusingly, all the boxes were about the same size and colour.
